archer.1: Erstelle eine Schaden 3 Falle in einem leeren angrenzenden Feld zum nchsten Gegner.

deep-terror.1: %game.action.summon% %data.monster.deep-terror% (%monster.normal%) in einem am Ziel angrenzenden Feld.

flame-demon.3: Erstelle eine Schaden 4 Falle in einem leeren angrenzenden Feld zum nchsten Gegner.

giant-viper.1: Fge +2 %game.action.attack% hinzu wenn das Ziel an einer verbndeten %data.monster.giant-viper% angrenzt.
giant-viper.2: Alle Angriffe gegen %data.monster.giant-viper% erhalten in dieser Runde Nachteil.

harrower-infester.1: Fhre "%game.action.heal% 2, %game.specialTarget.self%" fr jedes angegriffene Ziel durch.

hound.1: Fge +2 %game.action.attack% hinzu wenn das Ziel an einem verbndeten %data.monster.hound% angrenzt.

night-demon.1: Alle angrenzenden Verbndeten und Gegner erleiden 2 Schaden.

ooze.2: %game.action.summon% %data.monster.ooze% (%monster.normal%) with a hit point value equal to the summoning %data.monster.ooze%'s current hit point value (limited by a normal %data.monster.ooze%'s specified maximum hit point value)

savvas-lavaflow.1: All allies and enemies adjacent to the target suffer 2 damage

bandit-commander.1: Move to next door and reveal room

captain-of-the-guard.1: All allies add +1 %game.action.attack% to all attacks this round

archer.1: Create a 3 damage trap in an adjacent empty hex closest to an enemy.

deep-terror.1: %game.action.summon% %data.monster.deep-terror% (%monster.normal%) in a hex adjacent to the target

flame-demon.3: Create a 4 damage trap in an adjacent empty hex closest to an enemy.

giant-viper.1: Add +2 %game.action.attack% if the target is adjacent to any of the %data.monster.giant-viper%'s allies.
giant-viper.2: All attacks targeting %data.monster.giant-viper% this round gain Disadvantage.

hound.1: Add +2 %game.action.attack% if the target is adjacent to any of the %data.monster.hound%'s allies.

night-demon.1: All adjacent enemies and allies suffer 1 damage.

ooze.2: %game.action.summon% %data.monster.ooze% (%monster.normal%) with a hit point value equal to the summoning %data.monster.ooze%'s current hit point value (limited by a normal %data.monster.ooze%'s specified maximum hit point value)

savvas-lavaflow.1: All allies and enemies adjacent to the target suffer 2 damage

bandit-commander.1: Move to next door and reveal room

captain-of-the-guard.1: All allies add +1 %game.action.attack% to all attacks this round
